## SavedObjectTypeRegistry.isPrivate() method

Returns `true` if the given type is marked as `private`<!-- -->, and `false` otherwise.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isPrivate(type: string): boolean;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | <code>string</code> |  |
